All Classes

Class Description
AssignReinforcements
class to allot reinforcements
ConsoleWriter
class that keeps track and modifies log messages from the console
Continent
class that defines the characteristics of a continent.
Country
class that defines the characteristics of a country
CreateOrder
class to create order and add it in the list
CurrentGamePlay
class to execute current GamePhase and implement WarZoneController
DeployOrder
class to implement the Order Deployment
EditMapPhase  
ExecuteMapsCommands
The `ExecuteMapsCommands` class is responsible for executing map-related commands in the Risk game.
GameEngine
GameEngine class to start the "WarZone Engine" which contains the implementation of GamePhases.
GamePhaseEnum
Enum to manage all the phases of WarZone Possible States - EditMapPhase, GameLoadPhase, GameExitPhase
GeneralException
class for handling exceptions based on the messages passed to its method
LogGenerator
class for log generation, file creation and log manipulation
Logger
class for handling log messages
MapEngine
class MapEngine will help control all map related functions and it is the main view for the user.
MapEngineController
The `MapEngineController` class is responsible for handling map-related commands and interactions between the user interface and the map editing functionality.
MapFileAlteration
class that defines creating, saving, reading and loading map files into the game
MapModel
class that defines all entities in the map (continents, countries, borders) and their operations
MapPhaseState
class containing method for clearing current phase of map
Order  
OrderDetails
class to contain the details of the order
OrderExecute
class to execute the orders in the list of orders
OrderIssue
Issue Order phase class
Player
Player class which holds the issue order and next order in the list of orders
PlayerStrategy  
ProjectConfig
The `ProjectConfig` class stores configuration constants for the project.
ResponseWrapper
class for managing responses with status values and descriptions
SingleGameMode
Single game mode class to be implemented in the future
Strategy  
TorunamentGameMode
Tournament Game Mode to be implemented in the future
WarzoneController
Interface containing start method to contain/maintain the current game phase
WarzoneEngine
Class to start the game with multiple options to the user.
WarzoneEngineController
The `WarzoneEngineController` class is responsible for handling user input related to game features in the Warzone game.
